## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/moduleimportsmanager">ModuleImportsManager</a> that operates based on a workload definition (see -thinlto-workload-def).

For modules that do not define workload roots, it applies the base <a href="/docs/api/classes/moduleimportsmanager">ModuleImportsManager</a> import policy.

Definition at line 528 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionimport-cpp">FunctionImport.cpp</a>.

### computeImportForModule() {#aa8294e48b89fb927ea78787e639cb44e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void WorkloadImportsManager::computeImportForModule (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a31671124e718a9212f15c19ac1e62515">GVSummaryMapTy</a> &amp; DefinedGVSummaries, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> ModName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionimporter/importmapty">FunctionImporter::ImportMapTy</a> &amp; ImportList)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Given the list of globals defined in a module, compute the list of imports as well as the list of &quot;exports&quot;, i.e.

the list of symbols referenced from another module (that may require promotion).
